title: problems connecting to sites

I use Google or DuckDuckGo (preferred) as my search engine. When I do connect I have problems if I try to play a video. Example: I can connect to Cnet.com but I can't play any vids unless I reconnect in Privacy Mode. What can I adjust in Firefox to connect an play vids without using Privacy? Thanks, any help if greatly appreciated.

title: How can keyboard users stop bookmarks menu auto closing after launching a bookmark in a new tab?
content:
Hello, I am a keyboard user. I am wondering if there is a way to prevent the bookmarks menu from auto-closing after I open a bookmark in a new tab?

I have already tried setting "browser.bookmarks.openInTabClosesMenu" to FALSE, but this seems to only work for mouse-users, who can then ctrl+click a bookmark and it will open in a new tab while leaving the menu open where it was.

Is there an equivalent setting for keyboard users? So you can press ctrl+enter on a bookmark with similar results? Or perhaps a different key combination other than ctrl+enter, for which the bookmarks menu won't auto-close?

Thanks.

title: New to multi-account containers: All existing stuff into "Personal" container?
content:
Hi,

I'm new to Firefox multi-account containers and I want to now put all already synced data (all my browser history, logins, bookmarks, ...) into the "personal" container. Is this possible?

If it is, there is a secondary question, is it possible to turn off synchronization of a specific container on another device?

Use case: I want to have a work container that contains all work related data and a personal container that contains all my personal data. I want to be able to access the work container on my personal laptop, but don't want to necessarily access my personal container on my work laptop. I don't really want all that stuff to be synced to my work laptop.
